backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing account creation, access control checks, and user profile storage with admin-restricted queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend files across pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions establishing light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, shared layout, and all route definitions including new /privacy page.
Gate component enforcing admin-only access using identity login and admin verification checks.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerNotice: Empty placeholder file for a disclaimer component.
frontend/src/components/GetStartedForm.t: Account creation form that validates inputs and triggers backend mutation with UI feedback and optional navigation.
frontend/src/components/GreenSectionCard: Reusable gradient card wrapper supporting HTML div attributes for clickable sections.
frontend/src/components/ProfileTile.tsx: Profile display component showing avatar, name, optional title, and optional placeholder badge.
frontend/src/components/RouteTransitionO: Displays a full-screen loading overlay when a route transition is active.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with recognition sections, associated companies, legal links, and route-transition navigation.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides the main header with logo, navigation, and mobile menu using route-transition-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/UsersWorldwideKp: Shows an animated global user count KPI based on fetched account statistics.
frontend/src/config/admin.ts: Exports a placeholder admin principal configuration value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for account operations, user profiles, admin checks, and statistics using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteTransition.ts: Implements a context for route transitions, showing a short overlay and handling timed navigation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme CSS variables, and adds custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPlansPage.tsx: Displays available partnership plans with pricing and features and routes users to the signup page on selection.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersPage.tsx: Admin‑only page that lists all user accounts, supports logout, and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, KPIs, and feature cards that guides users toward signup.
frontend/src/pages/PlanSignupPage.tsx: Signup form for a selected plan with validation and backend account creation using react‑query.
frontend/src/pages/PlanSuccessPage.tsx: Success screen shown after account creation prompting the user to continue setup via Telegram.
frontend/src/pages/PlanTelegramPage.tsx: Displays a guided page prompting users to join a Telegram channel with steps and a button linking to the channel.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page with scrollable detailed sections on data collection, usage, cookies, and disclosure.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows a list of product categories using cards, each with an icon, description, and feature list.
frontend/src/pages/TelegramPage.tsx: A welcome page urging new users to join a Telegram community via a CTA button.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms & Conditions page with scrollable detailed sections on usage, accounts, and service terms.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and components with custom OKLCH variables, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing versioned state, rebrand requirements, legal constraints, routing behavior, and known issues for the TelsFX site.
